oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An account of the magic protection afforded by the Mantis to the Hartebeest and to the Eland (that to the latter being chiefly described here), dictated, in the Katkop dialect, by D a!kw in (L V.
4434). If a man has shot an eland he must perform certain actions to ensure that |kaggen (the Mantis) doesn't come to them or that the eland doesn't get up and run off.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The hartebeest and the eland belong to the Mantis
